text:
{
    "letter_title": ["Controverse mit der Basler Rheinschiffahrt A.G."],
    "send_date": ["1928-05-29"],
    "sender_persons": ["W. Raeithenbarg"],
    "receiver_persons": ["Dr. Max Vischer"]
}

The letter appears to be dated "Basel, den 29. Mai 1928" and is addressed to "Herrn Dr. Max Vischer" at "Albangraben 6, BASEL". It discusses a controversy with Basel Rhine shipping company and is signed at the end by what appears to be "W. Raeithenbarg" (signature may need verification). The title is derived from the main subject matter mentioned in the letter's content.
